text: Eilat Airport (, also known as J. Hozman Airport; ), or Hozman Airport, is an airport in Israel. It is in the coastal city of Eilat, in the south of the country. Eilat Airport is a public airport, mainly for internal flights. It was established in 1949. == Other websites == * Category:1949 establishments in Asia Category:Airports in Israel Category:Eilat Category:1940s establishments in Israel
title: Eilat Airport
